Description:
311994473 - IN/211021/AGF/FOD3/1 - You are failing to ensure the health safety and welfare of your employees in that you have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to metalworking fluid (MWF) in your CNC lathes and milling machines, which is a substance hazardous to health is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

311994510 - IN/211021/AGF/FOD3/2 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare of your employees in that you are failing to ensure that the exposure of your employees to metal working fluid, a substance hazardous to health, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
